local_intent: Confirm or recover target visibility, execute timed approach-and-align to the grape with 0.01 tolerance, then verify position reached.
assumptions: Pregrasp height already roughly established from earlier steps
Target name 'grape' resolves consistently across perception and motion
coherence_with_global: Mirrors global perception fallback (IsObjectVisible/ScanForTarget), applies the same Timeout(1500) around ApproachAndAlign with identical parameters, and adds a minimal positional verification via IsAt consistent with the approach phase.
